name: Baby Hazel's Class Time: Kitchen's Safety
name_original: Baby Hazel's Class Time: Kitchen's Safety
description: Cooking is both necessary and fun, but it is also a little dangerous. So before starting to invent your own amazing recipes, why not learn some kitchen safety first? Learn how to handle a knife without cutting yourself, how to cop vegetables without chopping off your fingers, how to wash a dirty knife. Don’t let the dishes gathering the sink, wash them immediately! Learn the signs so that you only use the right materials in the microwave. Other ones could burn or even explode. If you spill something on the floor, clean it immediately with a mop, otherwise you might slip and hurt yourself. If you need to get objects to high for your reach, just use a ladder, it will help! Do your best to avoid accidents in the kitchen by knowing these simple things. They will help you out a lot! Good luck!
